trans-unit.source: Provides the context for an <xref href="System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilder"></xref> object.
An ExpressionBuilderContext object is typically used to obtain a virtual path or a <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.TemplateControl%2A> property for use with an expression builder.
trans-unit.target: 对象通常用于获取文件的虚拟路径的 ExpressionBuilderContext 或 a<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.TemplateControl%2A>用于表达式生成器的属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.TemplateControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilderContext"></xref> class using the specified virtual path.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilderContext"></xref>类使用指定的虚拟路径。

trans-unit.source: The virtual path of the file associated with the specified <xref href="System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 与指定关联的文件的虚拟路径<xref href="System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilder"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilderContext"></xref> class using the specified template control.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilderContext"></xref>类使用指定的模板控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.TemplateControl"></xref> to use with the specified <xref href="System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilder"></xref>.
Provides an <xref href="System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilder"></xref> object with a reference to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.TemplateControl"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 提供<xref href="System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilder"></xref>具有对引用对象<xref href="System.Web.UI.TemplateControl"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: An expression builder might require additional information about the containing page to evaluate or parse the expression value.
trans-unit.target: 表达式生成器可能需要包含页后，可以计算或分析表达式值有关的其他信息。

trans-unit.source: This also provides the <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilder> object with information regarding the page that might be required.
trans-unit.target: 这还提供了<xref:System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilder>包含有关可能需要的页面的信息的对象。</xref:System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilder>

trans-unit.source: When an instance of a control is part of a control template, the TemplateControl property contains a reference to the containing control.
trans-unit.target: 控件的实例时控件模板的一部分，TemplateControl 属性包含对包含控件的引用。

trans-unit.source: Returns a virtual path to the file associated with the <xref href="System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilderContext"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 返回与关联的文件的虚拟路径<xref href="System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilderContext"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The virtual path of the file associated with the <xref href="System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilderContext"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 与关联的文件的虚拟路径<xref href="System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilderContext"> </xref>。
